00044 TableScanner::TableScanner(Comm *comm, Table *table, SchemaPtr &schema,
00045     RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator, const ScanSpec &scan_spec,
00046     uint32_t timeout_ms)
00047   : m_eos(false), m_scanneri(0), m_rows_seen(0), m_table(table) {
00048 
00049   HT_ASSERT(timeout_ms);
00050 
00051   IntervalScannerPtr ri_scanner;
00052   ScanSpec interval_scan_spec;
00053   Timer timer(timeout_ms);
00054 
00055   if (scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00056     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00057       ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, &table->identifier(), schema,
00058                                        range_locator, scan_spec, timeout_ms);
00059       m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00060     }
00061     else {
00062       for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.cell_intervals.size(); i++) {
00063         scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00064         interval_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(
00065             scan_spec.cell_intervals[i]);
00066         ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, &table->identifier(), schema,
00067             range_locator, interval_scan_spec, timeout_ms);
00068         m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00069         ri_scanner->find_range_and_start_scan(
00070             scan_spec.cell_intervals[i].start_row, timer);
00071       }
00072     }
00073   }
00074   else {
00075     for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00076       scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00077       interval_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(scan_spec.row_intervals[i]);
00078       ri_scanner = new IntervalScanner(comm, &table->identifier(), schema,
00079           range_locator, interval_scan_spec, timeout_ms);
00080       m_interval_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner);
00081       ri_scanner->find_range_and_start_scan(
00082           scan_spec.row_intervals[i].start, timer);
00083     }
00084   }
00085 }

00088 bool TableScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00089 
00090   if (m_eos)
00091     return false;
00092 
00093  try_again:
00094 
00095   try {
00096     if (m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->next(cell))
00097       return true;
00098   }
00099   catch (Exception &e) {
00100     if (e.code() == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND
00101         || e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND)
00102       m_table->m_not_found = true;
00103   }
00104 
00105   m_rows_seen += m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->get_rows_seen();
00106 
00107   m_scanneri++;
00108 
00109   if (m_scanneri < m_interval_scanners.size()) {
00110     m_interval_scanners[m_scanneri]->set_rows_seen(m_rows_seen);
00111     goto try_again;
00112   }
00113 
00114   m_eos = true;
00115   return false;
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Hypertable::copy(TableScanner &scanner, CellsBuilder &b) {
00119   Cell cell;
00120 
00121   while (scanner.next(cell))
00122     b.add(cell);
00123 }
